name: benchpress
description: A simple benchmarking framework for javascript, inspired by Jest.
author: Lucas Aschenbach

scripts.build:cli: pnpm dlx esbuild bin/benchpress.ts --bundle --packages=external --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/bin/benchpress.js && sed -i '' 's/--import tsx//' dist/bin/benchpress.js && chmod +x dist/bin/benchpress.js
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && pnpm run build:cli
